title: Super Easy Peanut Butter Cookies Recipe
description: These Kraft peanut butter cookies made with just 3 ingredients — smooth peanut butter, sugar, and egg — are great at Christmas and for gift-giving.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Everyday Cooking Super Easy Peanut Butter Cookies 4.5 (104) 86 Reviews 10 Photos These Kraft peanut butter cookies are easy, fast, and super delicious. This is our best go-to recipe when we need cookies in a snap! Submitted by Kraft Peanut Butter Updated on September 22, 2022 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 10 10 10 10 Prep Time: 5 mins Cook Time: 20 mins Additional Time: 5 mins Total Time: 30 mins Servings: 24 Yield: 24 cookies Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 24 servings 1 cup KRAFT Smooth Peanut Butter ½ cup white sugar 1 large egg Directions Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Mix together peanut butter, sugar, and egg in a large bowl until well blended. Roll dough into 24 balls; place 4 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets. Flatten each ball with the back of a fork. Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, about 20 minutes; do not overbake. Cool on the baking sheets for 5 minutes, then transfer to wire racks to cool completely. I Made It Print 579 home cooks made it! Add Your Photo Photos of Super Easy Peanut Butter Cookies 01 of 10 Photo by  Trusted Brands 02 of 10 Photo by  UpbeatChive2772 09/27/2023 Simple, basic and still awesome. I grew up on variations of this recipe and now that I'm a pappy, I make them with a little more creativity, eg. ice cream flavour syrups (eg. caramel, chocolate, strawberry - cuz pb+j ftw!), coconut, chocolate bar chunks, or chips, etc. Go nuts, has many funs and then you has cookies for munchies. :) 03 of 10 Photo by  BlueBasil5720 01/07/2023 I have been making this recipe for literally decades now. And, I have progressed to a healthier version using natural peanut butter and monk fruit sweetener. They can be a bit harder and spread less, but still a fantastic cookie, kinda more like store bought consistency when you use the healthier ingredients. Also, I occasionally add a handful of caramel or Skor chips to the batch. Adds a kick of toffee flavour. AMAZING! As others have mentioned, ovens vary and also ingredient density varies as well. So, they may not be identical each time you make them, but that’s the nature of home baked goodies. I have never had a complaint with this recipe and my variations. My whole family devours them as fast as they are permitted! And, I love that I can whip a batch up so quickly and seem like a domestic goddess while exerting very little effort! 😀 04 of 10 Photo by  Ella 06/21/2022 delicious and super simple! when i was rolling the balls i thought the dough wasn’t firm enough but they turned out great! I also love adding chocolate chips to them and adding that sweetness! 05 of 10 Photo by  Joan Scofield 04/04/2022 These are the best peanut butter cookies.! 06 of 10 Photo by  SilkyOven1736 04/01/2022 Excellent 07 of 10 Photo by  tawanda stiggers 04/18/2020 08 of 10 Photo by  Billie Bjornstad 04/11/2020 Not very good very quickly very dry I won’t make it again 09 of 10 Photo by  Aniceto Maldonado Jr. 06/11/2019 Im a guy that burns stuff all the time. Just kidding i can cook. Just never been a good baker of sweets. I had very good luck on my first attempt. Good recipe. I just made big monster cookies instead of trying to get 24 of them, i got 6. 10 of 10 Photo by  Trusted Brands 04/28/2016 1 You’ll Also Love Quick Peanut Butter Cookies 485 Ratings 4-Ingredient Keto Peanut Butter Cookies 145 Ratings Easy Peanut Butter Blossoms 49 Ratings Gluten-Free Peanut Butter Cookies 326 Ratings No-Bake Chocolate Peanut Butter Bars 203 Ratings Peanut Butter Choco Chip Cookies 57 Ratings Uncle Mac's Peanut Butter and Jelly Cookies 161 Ratings Flourless Peanut Butter Cookies 2,699 Ratings 5-Ingredient Peanut Butter Chocolate Cookies 17 Ratings Perfect Cashew and Peanut Butter Gluten-free Cookies 20 Ratings Pignoli Cookies 188 Ratings Ricciarelli 2 Ratings Mandelmakronen (Almond Meringues) 7 Ratings Cinnamon Stars 53 Ratings Authentic German Lebkuchen 1 Rating Grain Free and Gluten Free Chocolate Chip Cookies 5 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: Kraft Peanut Butter
instructions: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).;Mix together peanut butter, sugar, and egg in a large bowl until well blended.;Roll dough into 24 balls; place 4 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets. Flatten each ball with the back of a fork.;Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, about 20 minutes; do not overbake. Cool on the baking sheets for 5 minutes, then transfer to wire racks to cool completely.
